title: REC board approves hike in borrowing to Rs 1.5 lakh cr for FY24
description: The funds under the said revised market borrowing programme will be raised, from time to time, during the financial year 2023-24, with the approval of competent authority as per powers delegated in this regard by the Board of Directors, it added.
